languages.text: "Скажите им, что я разрешаю. Пустите всех в отсек, закройте и продуйте. Мне не нужен этот трусливый мусор".
"Tell them they have my permission. Gather them all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into the void. I have no need for cowardly refuse."
languages.original_text: "Скажите им, что я разрешаю. Пустите всех в отсек, закройте и продуйте. Мне не нужен этот трусливый мусор".

traits.locale_text: "Tell them they have my permission. Gather them in all in one compartment, seal it and vent it into space. I have no need of this cowardly rabble."
"Tell them they have my permission. Gather them in all in one compartment, seal it and vent it into space. I have no need of this cowardly rabble."
"Tell them they have my permission. Gather them in all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into space. I have no need for such cowardly rabble."
"Tell them they have my permission. Gather them in all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into space. I have no need for such cowardly rabble."
"Tell them they have my permission. Gather them all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into the void. I have no need for cowardly refuse."
"Tell them they have my permission. Gather them all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into the void. I have no need for cowardly refuse."

languages.text: «Dígales que tienen permiso, reúnalos a todos en un compartimento y expúlselo al vacío. No necesito chusma cobarde como esa».
languages.original_text: "Tell them they have my permission. Gather them all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into the void. I have no need for cowardly refuse."

traits.locale_text: «Dígales que tienen permiso, reúnalos a todos en un compartimento y expúlselo al vacío. No necesito chusma cobarde como esa».

languages.text: 「許可すると伝えろ。全員をひとつの区画に集め、そこを封鎖して虚空に放り出すのだ。ビクビクと及び腰の者は必要ない」
languages.original_text: "Tell them they have my permission. Gather them all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into the void. I have no need for cowardly refuse."

traits.locale_text: 「許可すると伝えろ。全員をひとつの区画に集め、そこを封鎖して虚空に放り出すのだ。ビクビクと及び腰の者は必要ない」

languages.text: “告诉他们我允许他们离开，把所有人都集中在一个舱室里。之后把舱室密封起来，直接丢到虚空之中。我不需要懦夫和废物。”
languages.original_text: "Tell them they have my permission. Gather them all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into the void. I have no need for cowardly refuse."

traits.locale_text: “告诉他们我允许他们离开，把所有人都集中在一个舱室里。之后把舱室密封起来，直接丢到虚空之中。我不需要懦夫和废物。”

languages.text: "Sagt ihnen, sie haben meine Erlaubnis. Versammelt sie alle in einem Modul, versiegelt es und lasst es dann in die Leere ab. Für feigen Abschaum habe ich keine Verwendung."
languages.original_text: "Tell them they have my permission. Gather them all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into the void. I have no need for cowardly refuse."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt ihnen, sie haben meine Erlaubnis. Versammelt sie alle in einem Modul, versiegelt es und lasst es dann in die Leere ab. Für feigen Abschaum habe ich keine Verwendung."

languages.text: « Dites-leur que vous avez mon autorisation. Rassemblez-les tous dans un compartiment, puis scellez-le et envoyez-les dans le vide. La lâcheté n'a pas sa place dans mes rangs. »
languages.original_text: "Tell them they have my permission. Gather them all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into the void. I have no need for cowardly refuse."

traits.locale_text: « Dites-leur que vous avez mon autorisation. Rassemblez-les tous dans un compartiment, puis scellez-le et envoyez-les dans le vide. La lâcheté n'a pas sa place dans mes rangs. »

languages.text: "Onlara izin verdiğimi iletin. Hepsini tek bir kompartımanda toplayın, ardından orayı kilitleyin ve kapıları açıp hepsini uçsuza yollayın. Ödlek sürpüntülere ihtiyacım yok."
languages.original_text: "Tell them they have my permission. Gather them all in one compartment, then seal it and vent it into the void. I have no need for cowardly refuse."
